$MSFT View @ www.elliottwave-forecast.com  As long as the 1/25 low remains intact, the instrument remains in the sideways zone.  We don’t like to trade the sideways area, only like to trade the extreme areas in 3, 7 or 11 swing.  However, we do favour more downside to take place but there is no good risk reward trade here in the middle zone. Chop is expected to ensue.  #Elliottwave #Trading #Stocks
